author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tense moments prevailed after a New College student travelling on the footboard of an MTC bus fell down and died near Pasumpon Muthuramalingam Thevar statue on Anna Salai on Friday evening.

According to police, following the incident, students staying at SC/ST hostel staged a protest on Chamiers Road demanding the arrest of the bus driver.

Mahaveer (18) was staying at the SC/ ST hostel in Nandanam.

He was travelling by the MTC bus plying between Anakaputhur and Broadway around noon when he fell down and sustained head injuries; he was rushed to the Government Royapettah Hospital (GRH), where he was declared dead on arrival. Upon hearing the news, students protested and demanded the arrest of the MTC crew.

Traffic was affected for nearly 15 minutes as a result of the protest.

Subsequently, the MTC driver, Abraham, was arrested by the police.

a demonstration demanding the MTC driver's arrest
title: Student’s fatal fall from footboard sparks protest
